articles.author: Beatrice Nolan
articles.title: Twitter's latest outage caused by single engineer's mistake: report - Business Insider
articles.description: "There's so much tech debt from Twitter 1.0 that if you make a change right now, everything breaks," an employee told Platformer.
articles.content:
A sole Twitter engineer was responsible for Twitter's high-profile outage on Monday, Platformer reported.
A site reliability engineer tasked with shutting down free access to Twitter's API made a "b… [+1460 chars]
